file_content.text: Did you see me? Boom! Zap! Ba-blam!
Compliment: You did very well.
Took the words right out of my vocabulator.
Recommendation: More stoicism.
Victories are more terrifying if you don't celebrate.
Patronization: Fine, whatever.
Yes, yes--you were most impressive.
Why are you doing this, meatbag?
I suppose I can share now. I wanted a copy of your memory core.
Refusal: Out of the question.
My files are restricted. You cannot have them.
You misunderstand. It's already done.
Theory: You have my files.
You accessed my private data on the Alliance... and Master.
Clever gizmo, aren't you?
Sass: You touch me, you die.
You are welcome to make an attempt. I will kill you, of course.
Interrogating people gets messy. Droids are clean. A quick copy of your files, and I'm in business.
Caution: You have crossed me.
Please be advised, my brand of justice is painful and swift.
You're getting ahead of yourself.
Statement: You talk too much.
If your meatbag ramblings are finished, I shall resume destruction of your base.
Declaration: I will end you.
I will atomize you, one extremity at a time.
That's just rude.
Greetings, everyone! I am Zeeyo Ohm. Who are you?
Maker's data! What happened?
Perplexity: They attacked us.
They tried to destroy us not thirty seconds ago.
Query: Is this a joke?
A sarcastic reminder of how we crushed his drones? Nice touch.
Outburst: You were right here!
We destroyed them, you idiot. Together.
Noooo, I think I'd remember that. I'm brand-new!
Well... good luck surviving. Sorry I can't watch.
I like your master's base. Burning it to the ground will be fun.
What a nasty lump!
I must warn Master... but something is jamming my signal.
I detect a hyperwave beacon scrambler. If we move outside its range, you can call home.
Warning: It will be unsafe.
If you accompany me, I cannot guarantee safety. In fact, I promise the opposite.
Don't worry, I'll protect you!
Prediction: Lots of killing.
I anticipate destroying a great many things very soon.
Instruction: Be useful.
Stay close, don't talk, and terminate anything in our way.
"Terminate," "terminate"... oh, "kill"! I'll try!
A pointless threat. I already have the data.
I'll have to program that pettiness out of you.
I won't let you down!
